reporting-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania

title.narrative: Assistance to The Ministry of Agriculture of Georgia in enhancing the administrative and institutional capacities

description.narrative: Although Georgia aspires to join the European Union, yet the country so far has not started to implement structural reforms in the agricultural sector. The country has no well-functioning structures in the sector of agricultural education, training and research or advisory services for farmers. It has been giving insufficient attention to such areas as the control and prevention of contagious animal diseases or food quality control. The main goal of the project consists in assisting the Georgian Ministry of Agriculture to work out the plan for the structural transformation of the agricultural sector according to the requirements the European Union. The successful implementation of the project will help Georgia to reform and strengthen such important areas as food control, prevention and control of contagions animal diseases and extension services providing advice and consultations to famers and other agricultural entities. All of these results will enhance Georgian agricultural productivity, create new job opportunities and reduce the dependence of the country on imported food.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Lithuania
